And if such a situation is common to every student, they or their parents will likely complain about it to protect their health. Because health should be secured in any situation, even in our paradigm. Even if by magical mechanism, teachers can't reduce the amount of homework, we strongly believe that homework should be prioritized over other activities such as playing with friends.
